messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Unschooling Word Scramble
messages.msgSnippet: This is too good not to put up on the list! Background:  I work in a Library.  One of the staff has a felt board where she puts of quotes by authors all
messages.messageBody:
This is too good not to put up on the list!

Background: I work in a Library. One of the staff has a felt board where she puts of quotes by authors all scrambled and people rearrange the words to gett he mystery quote. HOWEVER, people also rearrange and create there own quotes.

This morning: I came in to see Emerson's famous quote "sculpture and painting have an effect to teach us manners and abolish hurry" rearranged by a free spirit to read ABOLISH[ing] TEACH[ing] AND THE EFFECT OF MANNERS HAVE US PAINTING.

Now ain't that unschooling!

Happy thots
Tim T


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
